name: .MTZ
summary: Learn about .MTZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To install the theme an MTZ file contains on a MIUI device:
Place the MTZ file on your device.
Navigate to and import your MTZ file.
Apply the theme your MTZ file contains.
If you want to edit the theme an MTZ file contains, you can do so with ChaoMe Theme Editor, an unofficial MIUI theme editor.
If you want to view the constituent files an MTZ file contains, you can do so by:
Changing the file's extension from .mtz to .zip.
Opening it as you would any .ZIP file.
